commit.message:
re PR c++/24761 (templates and inline-asm and "+")

	PR c++/24761
	* pt.c (tsubst_copy_asm_operands): New function.
	(tsubst_expr) <case ASM_EXPR>: Use it.

	* g++.dg/template/asm1.C: New test.

From-SVN: r106831

+	(tsubst_expr) <case ASM_EXPR>: Use it.
